statements.sql: select * from `products` where `product_slug` = 'three-piece-3' and `product_active` = 1 and `products`.`deleted_at` is null limit 1
select * from `products_category` where `products_category`.`id` in (6) and `products_category`.`deleted_at` is null
select * from `product_has_images` where `product_has_images`.`has_images_product_id` in (22) and `product_has_images`.`deleted_at` is null
select * from `meserments` where `meserments`.`product_id` in (22) and `meserments`.`deleted_at` is null
select * from `product_colors` where `product_colors`.`product_color_product_id` in (22) and `product_colors`.`deleted_at` is null
select * from `reating_reviews` where `reating_reviews`.`product_id` in (22) and `reating_reviews`.`deleted_at` is null
select * from `users` where `id` = 9 and `users`.`deleted_at` is null limit 1

select `products`.*, `product_user`.`user_id` as `pivot_user_id`, `product_user`.`product_id` as `pivot_product_id` from `products` inner join `product_user` on `products`.`id` = `product_user`.`product_id` where `product_user`.`user_id` = 9 and `products`.`deleted_at` is null

select `users`.*, `product_user`.`product_id` as `pivot_product_id`, `product_user`.`user_id` as `pivot_user_id` from `users` inner join `product_user` on `users`.`id` = `product_user`.`user_id` where `product_user`.`product_id` = 22 and `users`.`deleted_at` is null
select * from `products_category` where `products_category`.`id` = 6 and `products_category`.`deleted_at` is null limit 1
select * from `products` where `product_category_id` = 6 and `product_active` = 1 and `products`.`deleted_at` is null order by RAND() limit 12
select * from `product_has_images` where `product_has_images`.`has_images_product_id` in (9, 10, 16, 21, 22, 23) and `product_has_images`.`deleted_at` is null

select `users`.*, `product_user`.`product_id` as `pivot_product_id`, `product_user`.`user_id` as `pivot_user_id` from `users` inner join `product_user` on `users`.`id` = `product_user`.`user_id` where `product_user`.`product_id` = 16 and `users`.`deleted_at` is null
select * from `reating_reviews` where `reating_reviews`.`product_id` = 16 and `reating_reviews`.`product_id` is not null and `reating_reviews`.`deleted_at` is null

select `users`.*, `product_user`.`product_id` as `pivot_product_id`, `product_user`.`user_id` as `pivot_user_id` from `users` inner join `product_user` on `users`.`id` = `product_user`.`user_id` where `product_user`.`product_id` = 9 and `users`.`deleted_at` is null

select `users`.*, `product_user`.`product_id` as `pivot_product_id`, `product_user`.`user_id` as `pivot_user_id` from `users` inner join `product_user` on `users`.`id` = `product_user`.`user_id` where `product_user`.`product_id` = 23 and `users`.`deleted_at` is null
select * from `reating_reviews` where `reating_reviews`.`product_id` = 23 and `reating_reviews`.`product_id` is not null and `reating_reviews`.`deleted_at` is null

select * from `reating_reviews` where `reating_reviews`.`product_id` = 22 and `reating_reviews`.`product_id` is not null and `reating_reviews`.`deleted_at` is null

select `users`.*, `product_user`.`product_id` as `pivot_product_id`, `product_user`.`user_id` as `pivot_user_id` from `users` inner join `product_user` on `users`.`id` = `product_user`.`user_id` where `product_user`.`product_id` = 21 and `users`.`deleted_at` is null
select * from `reating_reviews` where `reating_reviews`.`product_id` = 21 and `reating_reviews`.`product_id` is not null and `reating_reviews`.`deleted_at` is null

select `users`.*, `product_user`.`product_id` as `pivot_product_id`, `product_user`.`user_id` as `pivot_user_id` from `users` inner join `product_user` on `users`.`id` = `product_user`.`user_id` where `product_user`.`product_id` = 10 and `users`.`deleted_at` is null
select * from `reating_reviews` where `reating_reviews`.`product_id` = 10 and `reating_reviews`.`product_id` is not null and `reating_reviews`.`deleted_at` is null
select count(*) as aggregate from `products` inner join `product_user` on `products`.`id` = `product_user`.`product_id` where `product_user`.`user_id` = 9 and `products`.`deleted_at` is null
select * from `products_category` where `parent_id` = 0 and `is_menu` = 1 and `products_category`.`deleted_at` is null order by `name` asc
